attributes.action: End discrimination against Men, Boys and Fathers by the government, benefits and law. Give us Equality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Men are unfairly discriminated against by the courts & benefit systems. They are less likely to be allocated children by courts because the benefit system automatically allocates child benefit to the mother.
There are much more young female than male millionaires.
Single men are far more likely to be homeless.
Boys are falling behind because of inequalities introduced to the exams in `80s designed to address the(then) failure of girls.  
Men are far more likely to be incarcerated than women.
Paternal lags maternal leave massively , so families cannot choose who should look after the children/who works.
Men are much more likely to commit suicide than women.
Life expectancy is 81yrs(women) & 76yrs (men), yet far more NHS money is spent on Females than Males.
The electorate is mostly female, so MP`s are elected by women, men are a minority. Despite this there is a 
Minister for Women and Equality, & no minister for Men.

We ask that the Government end its discrimination against men by ensuring that equality legislation apply to government, benefits and law.
